channel.title: Cell Elongation on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Cell Elongation on COTTON

item.title: GbEXPATR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GbEXPATR Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: GbEXPATR, a species-specific expansin, enhances cotton fibre elongation through cell wall restructuring.

item.title: GhADF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhADF1 Gene Name: actin depolymerizing factor1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: characterized the function of a member of the actin depolymerizing factor (ADF) family in Gossypium hirsutum by down-regulation of the gene (designated as GhADF1) expression in the transgenic cotton plants.

item.title: GhAPX1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhAPX1 Gene Name: cytosolic ascorbate peroxidase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Here, a cotton (Gossypium hirsutum) cytosolic APX1 (GhAPX1) was identified to be highly accumulated during cotton fibre elongation by proteomic analysis.

item.title: GhBLH1_3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_59721 Gene Symbol: GhBLH1_3 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhBLH1_4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_48024 Gene Symbol: GhBLH1_4 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhBZR3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A10G0312 Gene Symbol: GhBZR3 Gene Name: Genome: genome version is NBI v1.

item.title: GhCERP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D02G2021 Gene Symbol: GhCERP Gene Name: Genome: cotton genome (Gossypium hirsutum, NAU) Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Inter-species functional analysis of the BR-mediated BES1-CERP-EXPA3 signaling cascade also promotes Arabidopsis root and hypocotyl growth.

item.title: GhCFE1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCFE1A Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCFE1A, a dynamic linker between the ER network and actin cytoskeleton, plays an important role in cotton fibre cell initiation and elongation.

item.title: GhEXPA3-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D04G1924 Gene Symbol: GhEXPA3-1 Gene Name: Genome: cotton genome (Gossypium hirsutum, NAU) Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhBES1 directly binds to E-box of GhCERP and regulates the transcription of GhCERP, which further binds to E-box of GhEXPA3-1 to enhance its transcription to promote plant cell elongation.

item.title: GhFL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A10G1256 Gene Symbol: GhFL1 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhFLA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhFLA1 Gene Name: Fasciclin-Like Arabinogalactan Protein Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A Fasciclin-Like Arabinogalactan Protein, GhFLA1, Is Involved in Fiber Initiation and Elongation of Cotton.

item.title: GhFP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A11G2808 Gene Symbol: GhFP1 Gene Name: Fibre-related Protein 1 Genome: AADD genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A basic helix–loop–helix protein (GhFP1) promotes fibre elongation of cotton (Gossypium hirsutum) by modulating brassinosteroid biosynthesis and signalling.

item.title: GhGT47B_A13
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A13G2031 Gene Symbol: GhGT47B_A13 Gene Name: Genome: reference genome sequence for G.

item.title: GhGT47B_D13
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D13G2434 Gene Symbol: GhGT47B_D13 Gene Name: Genome: reference genome sequence for G.

item.title: GhHUB2-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhHUB2-A Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhHUB2-D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhHUB2-D Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhKNL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhKNL1 Gene Name: KNOTTED1-LIKE Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton KNL1, encoding a class II KNOX transcription factor, is involved in regulation of fibre development.

item.title: GhKNL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhKNL1 Gene Name: class II KNOX protein 1 Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhKNL1_A08
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A03G021900 Gene Symbol: GhKNL1_A08 Gene Name: class II KNOX protein 1 Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhKNL1_D08
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G198400 Gene Symbol: GhKNL1_D08 Gene Name: class II KNOX protein 1 Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhMYB212
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gorai.007G350500.1 Gene Symbol: GhMYB212 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 212 Genome: Phytozome v.

item.title: GhPFN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhPFN2 Gene Name: profilin2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of a Profilin (GhPFN2) Promotes the Progression of Developmental Phases in Cotton Fibers.

item.title: GhPK6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhPK6 Gene Name: pyruvate kinase6 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton cytosolic pyruvate kinase GhPK6 participates in fast fiber elongation regulation in a ROS-mediated manner.

item.title: GhPSK
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhPSK Gene Name: Phytosulfokine-α Genome: Species: Gossypium arboreum Functional Descriptions: A peptide hormone gene, GhPSK promotes fibre elongation and contributes to longer and finer cotton fibre.

item.title: GhSWEET12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gorai.005G195100 Gene Symbol: GhSWEET12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: RNA-seq and protein−DNA binding assays revealed that GhMYB212 was closely linked to the pathways of sucrose and starch transportation and metabolism, directly controling the expression of a sucrose transporter gene GhSWEET12.

item.title: GhTCE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G2316 Gene Symbol: GhTCE1 Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhTCE1–GhTCEE1 dimers regulate transcriptional reprogramming during wound-induced callus formation in cotton Identify GhTCE1, a basic helix–loop–helix family transcription factor, and its interacting partners as a central regulatory module of early cell fate transition during in vitro dedifferentiation of cotton (Gossypium hirsutum).

item.title: GhTCP4A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A04G0407 Gene Symbol: GhTCP4A Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhTCP4D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D05G3657 Gene Symbol: GhTCP4D Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhXLIM6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_24080 Gene Symbol: GhXLIM6 Gene Name: lim protein 6 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: In this study, we identified a cotton XLIM protein (GhXLIM6) that is preferentially expressed in cotton fiber during whole elongation stage and early secondary cell wall (SCW) synthesis stage.

item.title: WLIM1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: WLIM1a Gene Name: LIM domain protein LIM-2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Dual Functions of WLIM1a in Cell Elongation and Secondary Wall Formation in Developing Cotton Fibers.
